items.title: Is The Procter & Gamble Company (PG) the Best Dow Stock?
items.description: We recently published a list of The Best and Worst Dow Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) stands against other Dow stocks. The Dow Jones Industrial Average is a benchmark index of the top 30 companies in the US. It represents [â€¦]
